xitsonga_ner_corpus.description: Named entity annotated data from the NCHLT Text Resource Development: Phase II Project, annotated with PERSON, LOCATION, ORGANISATION and MISCELLANEOUS tags.
xitsonga_ner_corpus.citation:
@inproceedings{xitsonga_ner_corpus,
  author    = {N.C.P. Golele and
                X.E. Mabaso and
              Roald Eiselen},
  title     = {NCHLT Xitsonga Named Entity Annotated Corpus},
  booktitle = {Eiselen, R. 2016. Government domain named entity recognition for South African languages. Proceedings of the 10th      Language Resource and Evaluation Conference, Portorož, Slovenia.},
  year      = {2016},
  url       = {https://repo.sadilar.org/handle/20.500.12185/362},
}
